mapper.select: select t1.`date` as `date`, sum(t1.view_count) as viewCount, sum(t1.vote_count) as voteCount, sum(t1.view_increase) as viewIncrease, sum(t1.vote_increase) as voteIncrease from ebook_snapshot t1 where t1.`date` >= date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) group by t1.`date` order by t1.`date` asc;
